name: Hakumod
description:
Adds Haku-men from Blazblue as a new playable character. 
 
 This mod currently includes 75 cards, 7 relics and 3 potions. 
 
 For the latest patch notes: https://api.github.com/repos/celebo/hakumod/releases/latest 
 
 The starting cards can be selected and custom bosses enabled in the mod's configuration panel. 
 Path: Main menu > Mods > Hakumod > Config
credits:
Special thanks: 
 Hexanoid, SaltBadGuy, stevo2402, von_yaourt for testing the mod and providing feedback.
